alert.note: Alert for Yellowstone National Park (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 7:26PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Yellowstone National Park between 740 and 815 PM MDT... At 725 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Island Park Village in Idaho moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph and pea-sized to one-half inch diameter hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Old Faithful, Madison, Fairy Falls, Mystic Falls, Firehole Canyon, Harlequin Lake, Fountain Paint Pot, Kepler Cascades, Gibbons Falls, and Craig Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seek shelter inside a building. Lightning can strike well away from the storm. Move indoors! Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
